_source.title: vitavit premium Pressure Cooker Set 2-piece
_source.description:
Pressure cooking made particularly convenient.

This newly designed model offers exclusive additional functions.

Easy positioning

Thanks to a metal tab on the lid, it is extremely easy to place the lid in the right position. And thanks to the newly designed rim of the pot, closing the cooker is also as easy as A, B, C.

Securely locked

When the cooker is closed correctly, a click is audible and a color display in the handle switches from red to green. Only then can the pressure start to build.

Three cooking levels

Apart from the two usual cooking levels, the vitavit premium offers an innovative steam cooking function. It works without pressure: You can take a look, stir and season at any time.

More information

The new traffic light display makes cooking with the pressure cookers clear and safe.

  • Yellow: The stove can now be turned down.
  • Green: The set temperature has been reached and the cooking time begins.
  • Red: The temperature is too high.

Even more safety

The vitavit premium is fitted with an ergonomical loop handle. This guarantees safe handling, even with wet or greasy hands.

Allowing steam to escape made simple

The special comfort steam discharge function allows you to precisely control the escape of the steam. It is no longer necessary to hold the slide manually.

For simple handling

The removable handle makes this pressure cooker easy to clean and to store. A practical advantage for several pots in the cupboard: they can be stacked in each other.

With CookStar all-stove base

With this base, the vitavit premium is suitable for every stove. The pot is heated quickly and evenly and you can even save energy.

The right volume is always what counts

The practical filling level indicator on the inside of the pot shows the minimum and maximum volume of liquid.

The vitavit premium also features a measuring scale in liters.

  • cute bird design

The Water Supplier Bördy comes in different sizes, for small and large flowerpots.

Bördy is a practical watering accessory, and your plants will love you for it!

_source.title: Chili Cutter Eddi
Set Elektrische Pfeffer- und Salzmühle
_source.description:
Set bestehend aus einer Salz- und einer Pfeffermühle, beide mit Licht.
 
Die Firma AdHoc hat als einer der ersten deutschen Hersteller mit der Produktion von elektrischen Mühlen mit Ceramic-Mahlwerk begonnen. Die ersten elektrischen Mühlen von AdHoc wurden durch die kultige Fernsehsendung Kochduell deutschlandweit bekannt.

Im Bereich der Produktinnovationen wurde das Thema Würzen und Mahlen von AdHoc konsequent weiterentwickelt. Die neue Mühlenpalette zeichnet sich durch Kombination bewährter Technik und innovativer Neuheiten aus: Grundsätzlich sind alle elektrischen Gewürzmühlen von AdHoc mit Mahlwerken aus Hochleistungs-Ceramic ausgestattet.
Dieses Mahlwerk ist nicht nur völlig geruchs- und geschmacksneutral, sondern auch absolut rostfrei und verschleißfrei. Auf diese Mahlwerke gewährt AdHoc 30 Jahre Garantie.

Nun kommt eine Weiterentwicklung hinzu. Durch eine neuartige gesetzlich geschützte Verschlussmechanik wird das Ausfallen von Mahlgut aus dem Mahlwerk verhindert. Die Aufmerksamkeit der Entwickler und Verantwortlichen bei AdHoc gilt vor allem der höchsten Qualität von Material und Verarbeitung. Von den Ergebnissen ist AdHoc so überzeugt, dass sie auf die Produkte bei normaler Handhabung 5 Jahre Garantie gewähren.
 
incl. 6 Batterien.

_source.title: finecut Multi-Cutter
_source.description:
Finecut, the practical fruit and vegetable cutter from Fissler.

For cutting, spin-drying, mixing and keeping fresh. Finecut cuts vegetables such as onions and carrots and also fruit and fresh herbs in a jiffy. It also allows you to spin-dry fresh herbs, blend soups, sauces and gravies and keep cut food fresh.

Simply innovative

The cutting system functions without electricity and is easy to operate. You only need to pull the pull mechanism several times and a few seconds later everything has been cut perfectly.

It couldn't be easier

Put the cable between five and twenty times for perfect results in just a few seconds depending on the desired coarseness or fineness.

Cleaned in a flash

Simply wipe the stay-fresh lid and the lid with the pull mechanism with a moist cloth - and put all the other parts in the dishwasher.

_source.title: vitavit premium Pressure Skillet 26 cm 4,0 Ltr.
_source.description:
Pressure cooking made particularly convenient.

This newly designed model offers exclusive additional functions.

Easy positioning

Thanks to a metal tab on the lid, it is extremely easy to place the lid in the right position. And thanks to the newly designed rim of the pot, closing the cooker is also as easy as A, B, C.

Securely locked

When the cooker is closed correctly, a click is audible and a color display in the handle switches from red to green. Only then can the pressure start to build.

Three cooking levels

Apart from the two usual cooking levels, the vitavit premium offers an innovative steam cooking function. It works without pressure: You can take a look, stir and season at any time.

More information

The new traffic light display makes cooking with the pressure cookers clear and safe.

  • Yellow: The stove can now be turned down.
  • Green: The set temperature has been reached and the cooking time begins.
  • Red: The temperature is too high.

Even more safety

The vitavit premium is fitted with an ergonomical loop handle. This guarantees safe handling, even with wet or greasy hands.

Allowing steam to escape made simple

The special comfort steam discharge function allows you to precisely control the escape of the steam. It is no longer necessary to hold the slide manually.

For simple handling

The removable handle makes this pressure cooker easy to clean and to store. A practical advantage for several pots in the cupboard: they can be stacked in each other.

With CookStar all-stove base

With this base, the vitavit premium is suitable for every stove. The pot is heated quickly and evenly and you can even save energy.

The right volume is always what counts

The practical filling level indicator on the inside of the pot shows the minimum and maximum volume of liquid.

The vitavit premium also features a measuring scale in liters.
_source.brand: vitavit premium Pressure Skillet 26 cm 4,0 Ltr.

_source.title: bionic Santoku Knife 18 cm
_source.description:
Nature has the best ideas!

The beaver is famous for logging trees with his bare teeth. He is able to do this, because his teeth never get blunt. They are made out of two materials, which scuff differently. The effect: an always-sharp bite edge.

We took advantage of the beaver tooth principle while designing our new knifes and brought it to perfection. A special, very hard coating makes the front of the blade nearly as hard as a diamond. Steel and Coating behave like the two beaver tooth materials.

The result: an always-sharp knife.

_source.title: vitavit comfort Pressure Cooker Set 2-piece
_source.description:
Pressure cooking made even simpler.

Pressure cooking made even simpler. The new generation with innovative functions. The extensive features of this model include not only the unique positioning aid, two adjustable cooking levels and the locking indicator, but also the removable handle. The cooking display with a traffic light function informs you when the stove can be turned down, the cooking time begins or the temperature in the cooker is too high.

Easy positioning

Thanks to a metal tab on the lid, it is extremely easy to place the lid in the right position. And thanks to the newly designed rim of the pot, closing the cooker is also as easy as A, B, C.

Securely locked

When the cooker is closed correctly, a click is audible and a color display in the handle switches from red to green. Only then can the pressure start to build.

Two cooking levels

The vitavit comfort possesses two cooking levels. The gentle setting is for delicate foods such as fine vegetables or fish, while the speed setting is for meats and stews.

More information

The new traffic light display makes cooking with the pressure cookers clear and safe.

  • Yellow: The stove can now be turned down.
  • Green: The set temperature has been reached and the cooking time begins.
  • Red: The temperature is too high.

For simple handling

The removable handle makes this pressure cooker easy to clean and to store. A practical advantage for several pots in the cupboard: they can be stacked in each other.

With CookStar all-stove base

With this base, the vitavit comfort is suitable for every stove. The pot is heated quickly and evenly and you can even save energy.

The right volume is always what counts

The practical filling level indicator on the inside of the pot shows the minimum and maximum volume of liquid.

Decorate your home with these new product ideas: vases, lovely boxes, eggcups and hangers. Have fun decorating and giving!

_source.description: Betty Etagere is the asymmetric pendant to the classic Koziol Etagere Babell. Betty is a little extraordinary and a bit retro in style, but as good as her bigger sister in serving fruits, vegetables, sweets and snacks.

_source.title: Koziol Measuring Cup
_source.description: Koziol Measuring Cup Dosis is essential for baking and cooking. The transparent Measuring Cups in two sizes have each a scale for sugar, flour and liquids. Every time the right Dosis.

_source.description: It´s bitterly cold outside, but we warm you up with ideas all about cosyness, relaxing, feeling good and enjoying. A warm cup of tea or coffee, delicious chocolate, beautiful candles for warm light at home. Just relax, sit back and have a look at those fancy warm ideas!

_source.description: Tea-Gifts are always a good idea for tea drinkers!  Our Tea-Gifts are original and have that extra certain something. From designer teapots and funny tea eggs to even unique sets of teabags, you will discover here unusual Tea-Gifts for all tea lovers, guaranteed.

_source.title: Easter´s nest
_source.description:
Looking for the Easter eggs?
Available here are great Easter ideas to help prevent losing the chocolate Easter bunny and its chocolate eggs.

_source.title: Filing System
_source.description: Tidiness with style and system. Avoid paper chaos by using these stylish filing systems to assort letters, documents and receipts.

_source.description: Here you will find many wonderful, small and unique Christmas gifts that will absolutely thrill the special people in your life.
